long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform the way you consume information with Briefy! ‚ú®
Powered by AI, Briefy quickly summarizes complex texts into structured summaries with key insights, detailed items, tables, mindmaps, and more. Multiple languages are supported. 
We offer both Chrome and Safari extensions. Whether you're browsing news, reading papers, or skimming videos, easily get the key points with just 1 click on both desktop and mobile phones! üöÄ

üåü How to Use It:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Add the extension to your Chrome. 
2Ô∏è‚É£ Sign in with your email address.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Open any webpage with text and click Briefy's magic button on the page for an instant summary.

üí• Our Best Features:
üñ±Ô∏è Key points with 1 click
To get the summary, you only need to click the Briefy magic button on the page. No more tedious copying, pasting, or app switching! 
ü™Ñ Overview, table, mindmap views 
Briefy goes beyond conventional summaries, offering insights through key points, tables, and mindmap views. Dive deeper into texts in seconds!
üí¨ Chat with your content
Dive deeper into summarized content by asking specific questions. Briefy provides detailed, context-aware answers, ensuring you grasp every aspect of the information and make knowledge interactive.
üîó Refer back to the source content
Easily navigate to the source material for a more comprehensive understanding. Cross-check and explore detailed information, ensuring a thorough grasp of the subject matter.
üí°Build your own knowledge base
Your external brain to save, review, find, and share your previous summaries. Maximize understanding by searching only the verified and reliable information you've saved with Universal Search in your knowledge base.
üåê Inline summary translation
Get inline translations of the summary in Premium and Ultra plans. Choose your preferred language and enhance comprehension and reading speed!
üí´Adjustable summary preferences
Choose the level of detail‚Äîconcise, medium, or detailed‚Äîand read the output in your preferred language. Whether it's English, Japanese, Spanish, or more, Briefy customizes summaries to suit your needs across all views.
‚¨ÜÔ∏è Export summaries in various formats
Effortlessly copy or download your summaries in Markdown, TXT, PNG, or CSV formats. Whatever summary view you choose, Briefy makes exporting content seamless and flexible to fit your exact needs.

‚òÄÔ∏è How Briefy Works:
Briefy utilizes Large Language Models (LLMs) technology to provide concise summaries, allowing users to effortlessly digest complex content without accessing ChatGPT or OpenAI accounts.
